description: Fabrication and supply of two fiberglass boats
full_summary:
Title: [F] F7044-220448_B 6.5 to 6.8m Fibreglass Boats with Center Console and Trailer

## Tender Announcement
Date published: April 12, 2023

## Contract Information
Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

## Goods and Services Required
Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking the fabrication and supply of two (2) fibreglass boats, measuring 6.5 to 6.8 meters in length, with center console and trailer. The boats must comply with the requirements outlined in Annex A - Technical Statement of Requirement (TSOR) and Annex F - Bidder Questions and Canada Responses. The delivery date for the boats is on or before February 28, 2024.

## Options
The contract includes an option for the contracting authority to acquire up to two additional boats, exercisable within 12 months from the contract award date.

## Procurement Details
The procurement method is Competitive Open Bidding.
The selection criteria is based on the lowest price.
The trade agreements applicable to this procurement are the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
The regions of opportunity for this procurement are British Columbia and Quebec (excluding National Capital Region).

## Tender Status
The tender status is expired.

You can get more information about this announcement at the specified URL:  http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15975795?extsite=MTU5NzU3OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions, please contact Jason Smith at (613) ... (extension not available) or via email at  jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
